original_title: ayumi hamasaki COUNTDOWN LIVE 2021-2022 A ~23rd Monster~
overview: Ayumi Hamasaki's COUNTDOWN Tour live 2021 to 2022, which took place on New Years Eve and was released as a special bonus disc on her ASIA TOUR ~24th Anniversary special @PIA ARENA MM~.
